*** Bug 72574 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This problem in this nightly build seems to have been caused by the same problem 
reported in bug 72499.  The stack traces are not the same so its not really a 
duplicate per se.  I was able to reproduce this stack trace in the aug 24 
nightly build, but not in the aug 25 build.

BTW: The aug 24 nightly build didn't pass the automated tests on any of the 
target platforms.  Its generally a good idea to stick to the weekly integration 
builds, or better to even more stable milestone builds.  Not much can be 
expected from a nightly build that fails all of the automated test suites.
